4306660.name: Saint George's Tavern Demo
4306660.description:
Saint George's Tavern Demo is a hilarious medieval tavern simulator set in the early 1800's during the ending of the reign of King George III (the Mad King).  This game is about more than just pouring ales and cooking food, It's full of fun, laughs and mini games that ramp up the audacious carry on that you would find in a tavern frequented by 'Muppets'... Get your tavern up and running, elevate your tavern rating and get ready for the full game in April.

Visit the Main Game page for a full list of all the games features for the Full version of the game.

The Demo allows you to play the first 5 days of December, with the full game going all the way to the 25th - Christmas Day at Saint George's Tavern with (hopefully) King George III visiting.

Please visit the Kickstarter page for special deals and help fund the development of the full game. Also - please don't forget to wish list the full version of the game!
4306660.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
